experiences.title: Here is a quick summary of my most recent experiences:

works.description: Here is a quick summary of my most recent experiences:

geshniz.title: Geshniz
geshniz.desc: This site is a single-page food ordering website written with NextJS and has a user panel, shopping cart, and products that use Redux Toolkit technology.

narcis.title: Narcis shop
narcis.desc: This site is a cosmetics website that was created with WordPress, and the main page and contact us, this website was designed with Elementor.
